<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2452</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The price of adaptive advantages to evolution.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Preis der anpassungsfähigen Vorteile zur 
Entwicklung.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le prix des avantages adaptatifs à l'évolution.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O preço de vantagens adaptáveis à evolução.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il prezzo dei vantaggi adattabili a sviluppo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τιμή των προσαρμοστικών πλεονεκτημάτων στην εξέλιξη.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El precio de ventajas adaptantes a la evolución.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">THis is an animation which demonstrates various survival adaptations to the environment, and their possible cost to the organism.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">adaptation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evolurion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese ist eine Animation, die verschiedene Überleben 
Anpassungen zur Umgebung zeigt, und ihre möglichen Kosten zum 
Organismus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ceci est une animation qui démontre de diverses 
adaptations de survie à l'environnement, et leur coût possible à 
l'organization.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um animation que demonstre várias adaptações da
sobrevivência ao ambiente, e seu custo possível ao organismo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una animazione che dimostra i vari adattamenti di 
sopravvivenza all'ambiente ed il loro costo possibile all'organismo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το THis είναι μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τις 
διάφορες προσαρμογές επιβίωσης στο περιβάλλον, και το πιθανό 
κόστος τους στον οργανισμό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es una animación que demuestra varias adaptaciones 
de la supervivencia al ambiente, y su coste posible al organismo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anpassung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">evolurion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">adaptation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">evolurion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">adaptação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">evolurion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">adattamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">evolurion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσαρμογή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">evolurion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">adaptación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">evolurion</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
